tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VP (VBD lost) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN heart)) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT the) (NNS beginnings)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NN winter)))))) (: ...) (SBAR (CC And) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBD was) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ convinced))))) (: ...))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [lost/VBD nsubj>I/PRP dobj>[heart/NN nmod:poss>my/PRP$] nmod:in>[beginnings/NNS case>in/IN det>the/DT nmod:of>[winter/NN case>of/IN]] punct>.../: ccomp>[convinced/JJ cc>And/CC nsubj>I/PRP cop>was/VBD advmod>so/RB] punct>.../:]
